text: seoiss-eul ttaena anj-aiss-eul ttaenanuwoiss-eul ttaena hananim-eul yeom-wonhago cheonjichangjoleul suggohaneun jadeul-i iss-eu ni ideul-i malhagil juyeo dangsin-eun a mu uido-eobs-i changjohaji anihasyeossna ni dangsin-ege yeong-gwang-eul deulinaida jeohuileul yuhwangbul-ui jaeang-eulobuteo bo hohayeo jusoseo
